content: smoothfox s christmas tree skirt created by donna mason-svara aka smoothfox copyright 2009 version 4 0 hobby lobby - i love this yarn 4 ply worsted weight color a cranberry 1 skein 7oz 364 yards color b white - 2 skeins 7oz 364 yards color c forest - 1 skein 7oz 364 yards hook size i 5 50 mm stitch marker one approximate size- 45 across point to point special stitches sdc - standing double_crochet place a slip knot on hook yo place your finger on the yo to it hold in place insert hook into designated stitch or space and pull up a loop yo pull through two loops two times v_stitch double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in indicated chain space or between 2 stitches indicated shell 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in indicated chain space available now through the links below http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/smoothfoxs-round-ripple- collection-one/patterns http //www etsy com/shop/smoothfox my ravelry store http //www ravelry com/stores/smoothfox-crochet- designs my etsy store http //smoothfox etsy com crochet and knit gifts http //zazzle com/smoothfox* my blog http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/ my email smoothfoxlover@yahoo com this pattern is written in english united states terms crochet terminology united states international slip_stitch slip st = single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet = double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet = treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet = double treble_crochet dtr double treble_crochet dtr = triple treble_crochet ttr triple treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet = quadruple treble_crochet qtr skip = miss if you want a pdf version of this pattern or if you crochet this item - please click on this link and add your own pictures as a project on ravelry http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-christmas- tree-skirt just click on the crochet hook with the words hook it near the top right side and this will add your item as a project then you can add the pictures when you have completed your project instructions note- first three chains of each chain-5 are considered a chain-3 space to be used in row 2 also note that there is no long beginning chain to start the project it starts with the first chain-5 and keeps adding length with each chain-5 row 1 using color a * chain 5 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in 5th chain from hook 12 times mark any st as right side finish off 24 double_crochet 12 chain-3 sps row 2 rs - join color b with a sdc see special stitches in 2nd chain of first chain-3 space double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same chain shell see special stitches in the 2nd chain of each of the next 11 chain-3 sps turn 48 double_crochet row 3 ws - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st shell in chain-2 space double_crochet in next st 11 times skip last st turn 72 double_crochet row 4 rs - slip_stitch in next st chain 3 double_crochet in next st shell
